<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_diagram_builder.DiagramBuilderSpot</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DiagramBuilderSpot</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DiagramBuilderSpot = Class.create();

// table name
DiagramBuilderSpot.TABLE = 'sn_diagram_builder_spot';

// table fields
DiagramBuilderSpot.SPOT_NAME = 'spot_name';
DiagramBuilderSpot.COORDINATE_X = 'x';
DiagramBuilderSpot.COORDINATE_Y = 'y';

// initialize script include by extending Crud base
DiagramBuilderSpot.prototype = Object.extendsObject(DiagramBuilderBaseCRUD, {
    initialize: function() {
        this.table = DiagramBuilderSpot.TABLE;
    },
    type: 'DiagramBuilderSpot'
});

DiagramBuilderSpot.getSpotById = function(spotId) {
    return new DiagramBuilderSpot().getById(spotId);
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-28 09:52:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1e30511153a710100b0cddeeff7b1233</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DiagramBuilderSpot</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Diagram Builder" source="sn_diagram_builder">1cf7ad026abf3abab12e761ddaa6e9df</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Diagram Builder">1cf7ad026abf3abab12e761ddaa6e9df</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e30511153a710100b0cddeeff7b1233</sys_update_name>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
